title: 2 Killed, 2 Injured in Karachi shootout
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 10 (APP):Two people were killed while two got injured in a firing incident in Gulistan Johar guest house in Karachi, a private news channel and police reported on Saturday.
According to the details, the deceased were identified as Abdul Salam and Nasir.
According to the initial investigation by police, Nasir had rented a guest house for a week where after the verbal altercation, the accused opened fire and killed both Abdul Salam and Nasir.
